argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | dprdff.w | |- W = { h e. X_ i e. I ( S ` i ) | h finSupp .0. } |
| 2 |  | dprdff.1 | |- ( ph -> G dom DProd S ) |
| 3 |  | dprdff.2 | |- ( ph -> dom S = I ) |
| 4 |  | dprdff.3 | |- ( ph -> F e. W ) |
| 5 |  | dprdff.b | |- B = ( Base ` G ) |
| 6 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_dprdw | |- ( ph -> ( F e. W <-> ( F Fn I /\ A. x e. I ( F ` x ) e. ( S ` x ) /\ F finSupp .0. ) ) ) |
| 7 | 4, 6 | #P_mpbid | |- ( ph -> ( F Fn I /\ A. x e. I ( F ` x ) e. ( S ` x ) /\ F finSupp .0. ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_simp1d | |- ( ph -> F Fn I ) |
| 9 | 7 | #P_simp2d | |- ( ph -> A. x e. I ( F ` x ) e. ( S ` x ) ) |
| 10 | 2, 3 | #P_dprdf2 | |- ( ph -> S : I --> ( SubGrp ` G ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_ffvelrnda | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. I ) -> ( S ` x ) e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) |
| 12 | 5 | #P_subgss | |- ( ( S ` x ) e. ( SubGrp ` G ) -> ( S ` x ) C_ B ) |
| 13 | 11, 12 | #P_syl | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. I ) -> ( S ` x ) C_ B ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_sseld | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. I ) -> ( ( F ` x ) e. ( S ` x ) -> ( F ` x ) e. B ) ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_ralimdva | |- ( ph -> ( A. x e. I ( F ` x ) e. ( S ` x ) -> A. x e. I ( F ` x ) e. B ) ) |
| 16 | 9, 15 | #P_mpd | |- ( ph -> A. x e. I ( F ` x ) e. B ) |
| 17 |  | #P_ffnfv | |- ( F : I --> B <-> ( F Fn I /\ A. x e. I ( F ` x ) e. B ) ) |
| 18 | 8, 16, 17 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( ph -> F : I --> B ) |
